name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"251eb1f5-af27-4deb-8d5d-97180193d4b5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: _handle_args","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f3b9d364-01ee-4088-9083-4a8795836654","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"_handle_args","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is responsible for analyzing arguments passed during a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"function call","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Note the distinction: while ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"_handle_function_def","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" deals with ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"defining","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" parameters (like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def foo(a, b)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"_handle_args","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" deals with ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"passing","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" values (like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"foo(1, x)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). Its job is to extract and resolve exactly what is being sent to a function.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e75a7341-75c5-49e1-9b25-cbe759b16d54","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"To build a "Call Graph" (a map of which functions call which), it's not enough to know ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"that","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Function A calls Function B. We often need to know ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"what data","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is passed. If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is passed to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"my_func(x)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the analyzer needs to resolve what ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" refers to at that moment. This function decodes that information so the analyzer can link the passed value to the function's internal parameter variable.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9efc1084-811f-4543-bdcf-2297ea942a70","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ba565a51-96e8-4f48-891e-40dfb6bf99fa","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Positional Arguments:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"cf595465-a9e8-4d45-8175-a32909ad8af7","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It iterates through ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"node.args","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (the standard arguments like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a, b","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"func(a, b)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9aa1922d-e0d1-446d-b8e0-7974db3f3a0e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It "visits" each argument to ensure it is analyzed (e.g., if the argument is another function call like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"func(get_value())","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0ce220eb-e5d3-48e4-aedb-147f50c353d6","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It uses ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"decode_node","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to resolve what the argument represents (e.g., the specific definition of variable ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or the literal value ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"5","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2dd980c7-4c0f-4b6b-85dc-a55e23552956","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It collects these resolved definitions into a list.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"584700cd-5402-41f3-8265-b2291332f188","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Keyword Arguments:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"1da03539-9796-4ef6-9a56-e470fe275332","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It iterates through ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"node.keywords","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (named arguments like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"key=val","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"func(key=val)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ac00a103-eeba-4cf4-8f9a-6ba4b08b4471","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It resolves the value being passed (the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"val","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" part).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d9807af2-94cf-4ffd-aa90-e6d3e8b14998","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It constructs a dictionary mapping the argument name (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"key","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") to the resolved definition of the value.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"a8bd9ced-9482-4c14-9e46-0663ab305363","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Code: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"calculate(x, mode="fast")","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" where ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is an integer variable.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7dea4023-6a2b-45e8-a76a-8cf0119204e1","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"_handle_args","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" processes the first arg ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"9da4cd51-836a-440e-b988-b638cba96355","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"decode_node(x)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" returns the Definition object for the integer variable ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b24eb7d9-4753-4492-9be5-053af8e0983a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"List becomes: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"[Definition(x)]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"fdc88c31-1286-4d67-83cf-6c5c177db749","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It processes the keyword ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"mode="fast"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"885c2f57-168b-4a5b-803f-5a57d8fa5974","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It resolves ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""fast"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to a String Definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"99bbdc38-fc75-4e33-ab5e-8e188d264204","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It adds a dict entry: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"{'mode': [Definition("fast")]}","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"7f65f8b1-086d-4138-8b14-daad92a0c1bc","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Returns: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"[Definition(x), {'mode': [Definition("fast")]}]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This result is later used to tell the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"calculate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function that its first parameter equals ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and its ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"mode","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" parameter equals ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""fast"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d39ac4d5-b8e8-49f1-ab18-2171c94d3323","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
